# Secure Vibe Coding OS

> A production-ready SaaS starter kit with Next.js 15, Clerk authentication, Convex backend, and comprehensive security features. Built for developers who want to ship secure applications fast while using AI-assisted development ("vibe coding").

This starter kit provides battle-tested security patterns for modern web applications, including CSRF protection, rate limiting, input validation, and secure authentication flows.

## Key Features

- **Next.js 15 App Router**: Server-side rendering for optimal SEO and performance
- **Clerk Authentication**: Secure user management with social logins
- **Convex Backend**: Real-time database with type-safe queries
- **Security-First Design**: Built-in protection against OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities
- **AI-Assisted Development Ready**: Optimized for vibe coding workflows
